Question: In July 1969 this person headlined a six-night stand at The Troubadour in Los Angeles.
Hints: Meanwhile, Apple released his debut album, this person, in December 1968 in the UK and February 1969 in the U.S.
On December 7, 1980, this person had an encounter with Mark David Chapman who would assassinate John Lennon just one day later.
In early 2006, MusiCares honored this person with performances of his songs by an array of notable musicians.
